name: MSI Installation From Suspicious Locations
description: Detects MSI package installation from suspicious locations
false_positives: Some false positives may occure depending on the environnement
query: (winlog.channel:Application AND winlog.provider_name:/[Mm][Ss][Ii][Ii][Nn][Ss][Tt][Aa][Ll][Ll][Ee][Rr]/ AND event.code:(1040 OR 1042) AND Data:(/.*\\[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Ss]\\[Pp][Uu][Bb][Ll][Ii][Cc]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Ee][Rr][Ff][Ll][Oo][Gg][Ss]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Dd][Ee][Ss][Kk][Tt][Oo][Pp]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Dd][Oo][Ww][Nn][Ll][Oo][Aa][Dd][Ss]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll]\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\.*/ OR /.*[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\.*/ OR /.*\\\\\*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Application AND winlog.provider_name:MsiInstaller AND event.code:(1040 OR 1042) AND Data:(*\\Users\\Public\\* OR *\\PerfLogs\\* OR *\\Desktop\\* OR *\\Downloads\\* OR *\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\* OR *C\:\\Windows\\TEMP\\* OR *\\\\\*))`
